textTemplates.name: ptAddress
textTemplates.text: {!CampaignMember.Host_Address_Street__c}, {!CampaignMember.Host_Address_Zip_Code__c} {!CampaignMember.Host_Address_City__c}

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody0DaysDanish
textTemplates.text:
Foredrag om arv & testamente inkl. gratis middag

Jeg glder mig til at se dig senere og byde p gratis middag kokken er i fuld gang med at forberede din ret.

Husk du er tilmeldt foredrag om, hvordan du bedst sikrer dig og din familie gennem arv og testamente {!txtStartTime}..

Vi ses p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

Antal billetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Billetnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

I dren skal du blot sige dit navn, s finder jeg din billet.

VIGTIGT:

Ved udeblivelse vil du blive opkrvet et gebyr p 150,00 kr. per deltager, da kokken tilbereder mad til dig/jer.

Jeg ser frem til at se dig!

Med venlig hilsen,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c} fra Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody0DaysEnglish
textTemplates.text:
Lecture on inheritance & wills incl. free dinner

We look forward to seeing you later and treating you to dinner the chef is already preparing your meal.

Remember, youre registered for the lecture on how to best secure yourself and your family through inheritance and wills on {!txtStartTime}.

Well see you at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

Number of tickets: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Ticket number: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

At the entrance, simply say your name and well find your ticket.

IMPORTANT:

If you do not show up, a fee of DKK 150 per participant will be charged, as the chef will have prepared food for you.

We look forward to seeing you!

Kind regards,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Heres Law

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody0DaysSwedish
textTemplates.text:
Pminnelse: Frelsning om arv & testamente ikvll

Jag ser fram emot att trffa dig ikvll fr frelsningen om arv & testamente.

Frelsningen brjar: {!txtStartTime}
Plats: {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}
Adress: {!Address}

Om frelsningen:
Du fr insikt i hur du bst skyddar dig och din familj genom arv och testamente och frst hur lagstiftningen pverkar just din familiesituation.

Antal biljetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Biljettnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

VIKTIG:

Vid utebliven nrvaro utan avanmlan kommer en avgift p 100,00 kr per deltagare att debiteras.

Jag ser fram emot att se dig!

Med vnlig hlsning,
Din Familjejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody10DaysDanish
textTemplates.text:
Om arv og testamente inkl. middag

Jeg glder mig til et hyggeligt foredrag, om hvordan du bedst sikrer dig og din familie gennem arv og testamente inkl. gratis middag, {!txtStartDateTime} p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}.

Antal billetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Billetnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Vi ses p {!Address}.

I dren skal du blot sige dit navn, s finder jeg din billet.

VIGTIGT: Nu er chancen for at melde afbud.

Hvis dine planer ndrer sig, og du ikke kan deltage, bedes du venligst afmelde dig i dag via dette link. Dette giver os mulighed for at tilbyde din plads til andre p ventelisten.

Ved udeblivelse uden afbud, vil du blive opkrvet et gebyr p 150,00 kr. per deltager, da kokken tilbereder mad til dig/jer.

Jeg ser frem til at se dig!

Med venlig hilsen,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody10DaysEnglish
textTemplates.text:
About inheritance and wills incl. dinner

I look forward to a pleasant lecture on how you can best secure yourself and your family through inheritance and wills, including a free dinner, on {!txtStartDateTime} at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}.

Number of tickets: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Ticket number: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Well see each other at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

At the entrance, simply say your name, and I will find your ticket.

IMPORTANT: Now is the chance to cancel.

If your plans change and you cannot attend, please cancel today via this cancellation link. This allows us to offer your seat to others on the waiting list.

If you do not show up without cancelling, you will be charged a fee of DKK 150 per participant, as the chef will have prepared food for you.

I look forward to seeing you!

Kind regards,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Heres Law

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody10DaysSwedish
textTemplates.text:
Sista chansen att avboka

Jag ser fram emot att se dig till frelsningen om arv och testamente {!txtStartDateTime} p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}.

Antal biljetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Biljettnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Vi ses p {!Address}.

VIKTIGT: Detta r sista chansen att avboka

Om dina planer ndras och du inte kan delta, vnligen avanml dig s snabbt som mjligt via denna lnk. Detta ger oss mjlighet att erbjuda din plats till andra p vntelistan.

Vid utebliven nrvaro utan avanmlan kommer en avgift p 100,00 kr per deltagare att debiteras.

Jag ser fram emot att se dig!

Med vnlig hlsning,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Din Familjejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody1DayDanish
textTemplates.text:
Foredrag om arv & testamente inkl. gratis middag

Jeg glder mig til at se dig i morgen til foredrag om arv & testamente inkl. gratis middag kl. {!txtStartTime}.

Antal billetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Billetnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Vi ses p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

I dren skal du blot sige dit navn, s finder jeg din billet.

VIGTIGT:

Ved udeblivelse vil du blive opkrvet et gebyr p 150,00 kr. per deltager, da kokken tilbereder mad til dig/jer.

Jeg ser frem til at se dig!

Med venlig hilsen,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c} fra Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody1DayEnglish
textTemplates.text:
Lecture on inheritance & wills incl. free dinner

I look forward to seeing you tomorrow for the lecture on inheritance & wills incl. free dinner at {!txtStartTime}.

Number of tickets: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Ticket number: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

We'll see you at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

At the entrance, simply say your name and we'll find your ticket.

IMPORTANT:

If you do not show up, a fee of DKK 150 per participant will be charged, as the chef will have prepared food for you.

We look forward to seeing you!

Kind regards,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Heres Law

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody1DaySwedish
textTemplates.text:
Pminnelse: Frelsning om arv & testamente

Jag ser fram emot att trffa dig imorgon fr frelsningen om arv & testamente.

Frelsningen brjar: {!txtStartTime}
Plats: {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}
Adress: {!Address}

Antal biljetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Biljettnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Om frelsningen:
Du fr insikt i hur du bst skyddar dig och din familj genom arv och testamente och frst hur lagstiftningen pverkar just din familiesituation.

VIKTIG:

Vid utebliven nrvaro utan avanmlan kommer en avgift p 100,00 kr per deltagare att debiteras.

Jag ser fram emot att se dig!

Med vnlig hlsning,
Din Familjejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody28DaysDanish
textTemplates.text:
Om arv og testamente inkl. middag

Jeg glder mig til at byde p middag og se dig til foredrag om, hvordan du bedst sikrer dig og din familie gennem arv og testamente {!txtStartDateTime} p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}.

Antal billetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Billetnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Vi ses p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

I dren skal du blot sige dit navn, s finder jeg din billet.

VIGTIGT: Afmelding hvis du bliver forhindret

Hvis dine planer ndrer sig, og du ikke kan deltage, bedes du venligst afmelde dig hurtigst muligt via dette link til afmelding. Dette giver os mulighed for at tilbyde din plads til andre p ventelisten.

Ved udeblivelse uden afbud, vil du blive opkrvet et gebyr p 150,00 kr. per deltager, da kokken tilbereder mad til dig/jer.

Jeg glder mig til at se dig!

Med venlig hilsen,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody28DaysEnglish
textTemplates.text:
About inheritance and wills incl. dinner

I look forward to inviting you to dinner and seeing you at the lecture on how you can best secure yourself and your family through inheritance and wills on {!txtStartDateTime} at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}.

Number of tickets: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Ticket number: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Well see each other at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

At the entrance, simply say your name, and I will find your ticket.

IMPORTANT: Cancellation if you are unable to attend

If your plans change and you cannot participate, please cancel as soon as possible via this cancellation link. This allows us to offer your seat to others on the waiting list.

If you do not show up without cancelling, you will be charged a fee of DKK 150 per participant, as the chef will have prepared food for you.

I look forward to seeing you!

Kind regards,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Heres Law

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody28DaysSwedish
textTemplates.text:
Pminnelse: Du r anmld till frelsningen

Pminnelse: Du r anmld till frelsningen om arv och testamente {!txtStartDateTime} p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}!

Antal biljetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Biljettnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Adress: {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

VIKTIGT: Avanmlan om du blir frhindrad

Om dina planer ndras och du inte kan delta, vnligen avanml dig s snabbt som mjligt via denna lnk till avanmlan. Detta ger oss mjlighet att erbjuda din plats till andra p vntelistan.

Vid utebliven nrvaro utan avanmlan kommer en avgift p 100,00 kr per deltagare att debiteras.

Jag ser fram emot att se dig!

Med vnlig hlsning,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Din Familjejurist

Billetnummer: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

Vi ses p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

I dren skal du blot sige dit navn, s finder jeg din billet.

VIGTIGT

Ved udeblivelse uden afbud vil du blive opkrvet et gebyr p 150,00 kr. per deltager, da kokken tilbereder mad til dig/jer.

Jeg glder mig til at se dig!

Med venlig hilsen,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c} fra Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptEmailBody7DaysEnglish
textTemplates.text:
About inheritance and wills incl. free dinner

You're registered for next week's lecture on how to best secure yourself and your family through inheritance and wills on {!txtStartDateTime} at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}.

Number of tickets: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}
Ticket number: {!CampaignMember.External_ID__c}

We'll see you at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

At the entrance, simply say your name and we'll find your ticket.

IMPORTANT

If your plans change and you cannot attend, please cancel as soon as possible via this cancellation link. This lets us offer your seat to someone on the waiting list.

If you do not show up without cancelling, a fee of DKK 150 per participant will be charged, as the chef will have prepared food for you.

We look forward to seeing you!

Kind regards,
{!CampaignMember.Lecturer_Name__c}
Heres Law

Adress: {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}, {!Address}.

Antal biljetter: {!CampaignMember.Remaining_Tickets__c}

VIKTIGT: Avanmlan om du blir frhindrad

Om dina planer ndras och du inte kan delta, vnligen avanml dig s snabbt som mjligt via denna lnk till avanmlan. Detta ger oss mjlighet att erbjuda din plats till andra p vntelistan.

Vid utebliven nrvaro utan avanmlan kommer en avgift p 100,00 kr per deltagare att debiteras.

Din Familjejurist

textTemplates.name: ptSmsReminder0DayEnglish
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!CampaignMember.FirstName}, We look forward to seeing you later and treating you to a free dinner - the chef is already preparing your meal. You're registered for our talk on how to best protect you and your family through inheritance & wills. Doors open at {!txtStartTime} at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c} Address: {!Address}
Number of tickets: Ticket number: At the entrance, simply say your name and we'll find your ticket.
IMPORTANT: If you do not attend, a fee of 20 per participant will be charged, as the chef will have prepared food for you. We look forward to seeing you!
Kind regards, Heres Law

textTemplates.name: ptSmsReminder0DaysDanish
textTemplates.text:
Kre {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Jeg glder mig til at se dig til foredrag om arv og testamente og byde p gratis middag - kokken er i fuld gang med at forberede din ret. Drene bner {!txtStartTime}, p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}! Adressen er: {!Address}.
Ved udeblivelse vil du blive opkrvet et gebyr p 150,00 kr. per deltager, da kokken tilbereder mad til dig/jer.
Jeg glder mig til at se dig!
Med venlig hilsen Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptSmsReminder0DaySwedish
ptSmsReminder10DaysDanish
textTemplates.text:
Kre {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Du er tilmeldt foredrag om arv & testamente inkl. gratis middag nste uge, {!txtStartDateTime}, p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}!
Adressen er: {!Address}.
Ved udeblivelse vil du blive opkrvet et gebyr p 150,00 kr. per deltager, da kokken tilbereder mad til dig/jer. I dag er sidste chance for at afmelde. Det kan gres via dette link: {!CancellationUrl}.
Jeg glder mig til at se dig!

textTemplates.name: ptSmsReminder10DaysEnglish
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
You're registered for the lecture on inheritance & wills, including a free dinner, next week on {!txtStartDateTime} at {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}!
The address is: {!Address}.
If you do not attend without cancelling, you will be charged a fee of 20 per participant, as the chef will have prepared food for you. Today is the last chance to cancel. You can do so via this link: {!CancellationUrl}.
I look forward to seeing you!

textTemplates.name: ptSmsReminder10DaysSwedish
textTemplates.text:
Hej {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Du r anmld till frelsningen den {!txtStartDateTime}, p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}! Adressen r: {!Address}.
Har du blivit frhindrad att delta? Meddela oss i god tid - du kan avanmla dig hr: {!CancellationUrl}
Vid utebliven nrvaro utan avanmlan kommer en avgift p 100,00 kr per deltagare att debiteras.
Jag ser fram emot att se dig!
Med vnlig hlsning Din Familjejurist

textTemplates.name: ptSmsReminder1DayDanish
textTemplates.text:
Kre {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Du er tilmeldt foredrag om arv & testamente inkl. gratis middag i morgen, {!txtStartDateTime}, p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}! Adressen er: {!Address}. Jeg glder mig til at se dig!
Med venlig hilsen Din Familiejurist

textTemplates.name: ptSmsReminder1DayEnglish
ptSmsReminder1DaySwedish
textTemplates.text:
Hej {!CampaignMember.FirstName},
Jag ser fram emot att trffa dig imorgon till frelsningen om arv & testamente. Frelsningen brjar {!txtStartDateTime} p {!CampaignMember.Venue__c}. Adressen r: {!Address}.
Vi ser fram emot att se dig!
Med vnlig hlsning, Din Familjejurist
